text: Dogs have a sense of time. It's been proven that they know the difference between a hour and five. If conditioned to, they can predict future events, such as regular walk times.
Petting a dog and gazing into their eyes releases oxytocin (i.e the “love hormone”) not only for you, but for them as well.
The reason dogs curl up is because of an age-old instinct to keep themselves warm and to protect vital organs while they sleep.
Dogs have wet noses because it helps to absorb scent chemicals.
